title: RethinkDB transfer tool for MongoDB database
author: cond289123
content: readme.md mongo--rethinkrethinkdb transfer tool mongodb database. is safer every transaction is kept a promise queue.installnpm install mongo--rethink -g collections are transferred unless collection is defined. define more one collection;mongo--rethink -db app -c user -c postusageusage: mongo--rethink [options]options: --mongo-host, --mh mongodb host (default localhost) --mongo-port, --mp mongodb port (default 27017) --database, --db mongodb database --collection, -c mongodb collection --rethink-host, --eh rethinkdb host (default localhost) --rethink-port, --ep rethinkdb port (default 28015) --rethink-user, --ru rethinkdb username --rethink-pass, --rp rethinkdb password --concurrency, --con promise concurrency (default 250) --help show help
